author: Matthew Dalton
title: Former French President Nicolas Sarkozy Faces Trial Over Influence-Peddling and Corruption Charges
text:
PARIS—Prosecutors ordered former French President Nicolas Sarkozy to stand trial for allegedly attempting to obtain confidential information about a police inquiry into his campaign finances, compounding the politician’s legal woes as he faces two other criminal investigations.
Mr. Sarkozy is suspected of using his influence in 2013 as a former head of state to help a senior French court official seek a plum job in Monaco. In return, prosecutors allege Mr. Sarkozy sought access to information about a separate police inquiry...
